Ask HN: Will HN moderators add a spam filter for replies written by ChatGPT?
text:
Many of the "Ask: .." topics could be answered with ChatGPT creating long, generic responses and lots of noise inside.

Will tools be used to identify text written by ChatGPT to flag it as spam?

I think this decision is very important in predicting the future of ChatGPT and distinguishing whether it is just a buzzword of the moment. Humans are enthusiastic about having a robot write a reply, but they don't want to read a robot's reply.

Looking for Co-Founder – Change Management
text:
We're a team currently working on developing an automated and on-demand change management service to help small and medium-sized businesses. We believe that this service will help to make change management accessible to more companies, and we're excited about the impact it could have. We're currently looking for someone to join our team as a Co-Founder. Specifically, we're looking for someone with experience in sales and change management. If you have experience in consulting, that's a plus.

Looking for someone to join our team as a Co-Founder. Specifically, we're looking for someone with experience in sales and change management. If you have experience in consulting, that's a plus.

We're still in the early stages of development, but we have a clear vision and we're making progress. If this sounds like an opportunity you might be interested in and you're excited about the potential of this service to help SMBs, we'd love to chat and see if it's a good fit.

If you're interested, send an email to visaviren90@gmail.com, and let's schedule a call. Please include either a short bullet list resume and Linkedin profile. Changeable Presentation https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Bb09YDpwymvwRjuBOkdv1OPLMU3-RD4P/view?usp=sharing
